ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 15 of 16.
Probe investigates a missing expedition on Mount Everest. He discovers a hidden solar energy station.
The crew of the star ship Ajex encounters vampires and Rimmer is bitten and transformed into a vampire. He ravages through the crew until he is stopped by the cook.
Judge Dredd discovers that his old friend, Judge Gibson, is secretly committing crimes as Mutie the Pig.
